flavorText:
"No dwarf alive can best one of my crew dead."
—Zeki, Reef Pirate

foreignData.name: Zwergischer Seefahrerclan
foreignData.text: {T}: Am Ende des Kampfes fügt der Seefahrerclan einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur Deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur dann, wenn der Beherrscher dieser Kreatur Inseln beherrscht.

name: Dwarven Sea Clan
originalText:
oc
T: At end of combat, Dwarven Sea Clan deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Use this ability only if that creature's controller controls any islands.

rulings.text: You can’t target a creature if its controller doesn’t control an Island as you are activating the ability, and the ability won’t resolve if the creature’s controller doesn’t control an Island as the ability resolves.

If control of the targeted creature changes between the activating and resolution of the ability (ie, while it’s on the stack), then the player who must control an Island as the ability resolves is the creature’s new controller.

text: {T}: Choose target attacking or blocking creature whose controller controls an Island. Dwarven Sea Clan deals 2 damage to that creature at end of combat. Activate only before the end of combat step.
